column5: Spacious Bedroom Room. Home-floor to ceiling windows to view large backyard. Fun Midcentury Modern home each bedroom has ensuite.  7 miles to NRG & 4 miles to Metro Park/Ride Close to HBU, Rice, UofH, Med Center, Museum District, Galleria, NRG Stadium, Downtown, hiking/biking trails, energy corridor, & Sugar Land off US 59/69. Diverse metro area set set in lovely 1/2 acre lots! Other spaces we have listed on Airbnb https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/3758775 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/12823202
column8: Lovely bedroom w/ensuite Mid Century Modern Home
